channel.title: PlagueCity - PK'ing - Kill Rewards - Curses - Fullscreen - LOADS MORE!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/3210/sdfsdfr.png[/img] Welcome to PlagueCity! A PK'ing server programmed by Demise. It's hosted on a 2GB VPS at the moment with a few months prepaid, and I'm going to be working on it as much as possible. I've tried to make PK'ing and minigames extremely enjoyable by using rewards for your amount of kills (generally untradeable), random PVP drops, artifact drops and minigame/pking points!
[B][U]Media[/U][/B] [IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/2851/fullscreeng.jpg[/img] Full, re-sizable fullscreen [IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/7141/turmoil.jpg[/img][IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/5111/protectj.jpg[/img][IMG]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/5016/bserker.jpg[/img] All ancient curses!
[IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/7858/icemanv.jpg[/img][IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/9848/safetyfirsty.jpg[/img][IMG]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/8148/airguitar.jpg[/img] New emotes!
[IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/7485/statszt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/1443/itemsondeath.jpg[/img] New interfaces and items on death!
[IMG]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/5082/clicklevelling.jpg[/img] Click a statistic to level it to a level that YOU want!
[IMG]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/7117/killrewards.jpg[/img] Kill rewards that are given to you when you reach an amount of kills!
[IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/9771/exchange.jpg[/img] PvP artifacts with gold/PkP rewards!
[IMG]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/203/minigame.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/6561/plpn.jpg[/img] Shops tailored to enjoyment!
[IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/4281/recipe.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/307/rfdt.jpg[/img] Complete RFD (now with harder difficulty!) to receive barrows + more gloves!
[IMG]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/5026/barrows.jpg[/img] Complete barrows for minigame points and barrows armors!
Thanks for reading! Open to suggestions :o![/CENTER]

@DemisePking wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to PlagueCity! A PK’ing server programmed by Demise. It’s hosted on a 2GB VPS at the moment with a few months prepaid, and I’m going to be working on it as much as possible. I’ve tried to make PK’ing and minigames extremely enjoyable by using rewards for your amount of kills (generally untradeable), random PVP drops, artifact drops and minigame/pking points!

Media

Full, re-sizable fullscreen

All ancient curses!


New emotes!



New interfaces and items on death!


Click a statistic to level it to a level that YOU want!


Kill rewards that are given to you when you reach an amount of kills!


PvP artifacts with gold/PkP rewards!



Shops tailored to enjoyment!



Complete RFD (now with harder difficulty!) to receive barrows + more gloves!


Complete barrows for minigame points and barrows armors!

Thanks for reading! Open to suggestions :o![/CENTER]
